table.name: vtiger_cbrfpdetails
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_cbrfpdetails` ( `cbrfpdetailsid` int(11) NOT NULL, `cbrfpdetailsno` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `related_product` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `quantity` decimal(20,0) DEFAULT NULL, `unit_price` decimal(16,2) DEFAULT NULL, `cbrfp_relation` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `offerdetail_code` varchar(56) DEFAULT NULL, `offerdetail_rate` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `offerdetail_notes` varchar(250) DEFAULT NULL, `offerdetail_condition` varchar(16) DEFAULT NULL, `related_pricebook` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `offerdetail_image` varchar(250) DEFAULT NULL, `vat_tax` decimal(10,2) DEFAULT NULL, `net_price` decimal(10,2) DEFAULT NULL, `total_price` decimal(10,2) DEFAULT NULL, `vat_value` decimal(10,2) DEFAULT NULL, `usageunit` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `sequence_no` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`cbrfpdetailsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_cbrfpdetailscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_cbrfpdetailscf` ( `cbrfpdetailsid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`cbrfpdetailsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
